description: A column by Michael Beschloss about historical episodes that resonate today. A presidential historian, Mr. Beschloss is the author of nine books and a contributor to NBC News and “PBS NewsHour.”
title: Business
text:
Image
The Ad That Helped Reagan Sell Good Times to an Uncertain Nation
The 1984 commercial “Morning in America” is considered one of the most effective campaign spots ever broadcast, and it most likely cemented Reagan’s re-election.
